title: stop shouting!
text: We had some info on this motel from another source and decided to give it a try. Having lived some years in SF I knew Lombard St. might not be ideal, but since we had a car the free parking was enticing, and free breakfast was mentioned... all in all maybe a good deal.WRONG! The staff was continually berating us and others including shouting matches long into the night that even drowned out the horrendous traffic.Breakfast was 1 old cello-wrapped danish per person distributed like in maximum security and some WMD coffee.The parking lot was floodlit to the point you could read in bed all night even with curtains drawn.verdict: double plus ungood.
